content.question: Which therapist best illustrates the humanistic orientation to therapy?

choices.label: Gil’s therapist, who engages in active listening during their sessions
Calypso’s therapist, who utilizes virtual reality exposure to reduce her fear of heights
Persephone’s therapist, who uses free association to identify internal conflicts
Ashley’s therapist, who pushes her to think in less catastrophic terms

content.answer: Gil’s therapist, who engages in active listening during their sessions
